title: Yup... sure... why not!
body:
Words fail me..

I don't really know how an ability that deals 450 (plus AP which clearly she doesn't have) magic damage actually does 2900 true damage, or that an ability that deals physical damage if I'm not mistaken, does 4000+ true damage.... especially when my max health was 3888 (and it was only an assist, not even the killing blow) 

Seems legit.

Of course some nut will try to justify this, thats just the way the world works... go on then do your best, id love to see how you get out of this one!

replies.body: Stop with the death recap posts and just accept that it's buggy. Literally not a sole on the boards is gonna look at a death recap post and think "Gee Willikers this guy has found a game breaking bug/op champ!"

Unless we keep it in riots attention, nothing will ever be down about it.

nagging works for kids and businessmen, might as well try it here.
